title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: 1.Assignments related to basics of Python- Programming.2.Solution of a set of linear algebraic equations and application t.3.Solution of a set of non-linear equations and application 4.Solutions of a set of ordinary differential equation and application t.5.Solution of a transient, one dimensional heat conduction equation with temperature dependent properties related to heat treatment problem.6.Solution of multidimensional diffusive partial differential equation related to heat
